DataSourcePortable.Name: Documentos bloqueados a mais de dez dias
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT A.HANDLE FROM CT_DOCUMENTOS A
JOIN Z_DATAS DATAS ON DATAS.DATA = @HOJE
WHERE A.DATA < @ADDDAY(DATAS.DATA, -10) AND A.EMPRESA = @EMPRESA
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="HANDLE" From="A" Path="HANDLE" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
